ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR(IF( RW_Unregistered_Broker_Mobile__c != null, NOT(REGEX(RW_Unregistered_Broker_Mobile__c , "[0-9]{7,13}")), false)),$Label.Disable_all_validations_from_lead == "false" /*Added by Prashant to control disabling all validations together*/)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter valid Channel Partner mobile no.
